entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is introduced as a character who speaks contemptuously to someone else in the story.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is introduced as a character who suggests waking up Madam Marsh.

entities.name: madam marsh
entities.description: Madam Marsh is introduced as a character who needs to be woken up by Stan.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is looking out of the window and feeling nervous.

entities.name: abergavenny
entities.description: Abergavenny is mentioned as the destination that the Knight Bus will arrive at in a minute.

relationships.description: Stan wakes up Madam Marsh by bringing her down from the bus.
Ernie suggests waking up Madam Marsh to Stan.
